prompt: Spy Animals in a High-Stakes Heist Movie

cards.name: Agent Furrytail
cards.bio: A stealthy squirrel with a knack for acrobatics and infiltration.

cards.name: Commander Claw
cards.bio: A fierce feline with sharp reflexes and sharper claws, leading the heist.

cards.name: Sneak Beak
cards.bio: A cunning crow, unmatched in surveillance and aerial recon.

cards.name: Mole Hacker
cards.bio: A tech-savvy mole who can dig through data as well as he digs through the earth.

cards.name: Bark Knight
cards.bio: A loyal dog with a dark past, now using his strength for the greater good.

cards.name: Whisker Sniper
cards.bio: A sharpshooting mouse with an eye for detail and a paw steady under pressure.

cards.name: Paws McSteal
cards.bio: A raccoon with a talent for thievery and getting into tight spaces.

cards.name: Dive Bomber Duck
cards.bio: An expert in aerial assaults, this duck dives into danger without hesitation.

cards.name: Espionage Elephant
cards.bio: A massive presence in the field, his memory and strength are unparalleled.

cards.name: Infiltrator Iguana
cards.bio: A master of disguise, this iguana blends into any environment seamlessly.

cards.name: The Big Bad Wolf
cards.bio: The ultimate adversary, a cunning predator turned criminal mastermind.
